title: Learning Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Technology-Enhanced Open Social Learning Scenario Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete social issue analysis projects in mobile environments with over 80% completion using open-ended educational scenarios.
Learners can propose at least one solution to social issues by collaborating with peers and assigning roles using collaboration tools.
Learners can improve solutions by repeating the feedback collection and application process at least three times in a technology-based learning system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
